This 2021 Toyota Hilux 2.0 S has been kept in pristine condition. The vehicle comes with a host of extras which include:

-Electric Mirrors
-Electric Windows

-Aircon
-Radio
-USB Port
-AUX Port
-Bluetooth

Please contact Haval Edenvale to view the vehicle. In house finance is available.
